### Aircrew Helmet Communication Upgrade
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-237096/B
#### Solicitation Date: 2023-07-24 

The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks a modification kit for the GENTEX Model HGU-56/P (HGU-56/P) and GENTEX Model 190A (190A) helmets to improve hearing protection and communications intelligibility for RCAF aircrew. The modification kit must include replacement of the Boom Microphone and Speaker/Ear piece for all existing helmets of those types.

#### Security Requirements
This requirement involves security requirements. Refer to Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses for additional information. Bidders should also consult the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/index-eng.html) for information on personnel and organization security screening or security clauses.

#### Document Submission
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Modification Details
* Modification kit design and manufacture
* Replacement of existing Boom Microphone and Speaker/Ear piece with new ones
* Security screening of personnel and organization involved in the project

#### Tender Status
The notice issue date is 2023-07-24, and the tender closing date is 2023-11-09 at 14:00:00.
